media:group.media:title: GTA+ Membership Benefits - November 2022
media:group.media:description:
Video breakdown of the benefits GTA+ Members will receive in the current month of Membership (November 2, 2022 - December 12, 2022).
The intent of this video is to show players the full extent of the bonuses and discounts available in the game and neither to encourage nor discourage the purchase of GTA+.
GTA+ is a membership program which delivers benefits and rewards on GTA Online for both new and long-standing players exclusively on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.
► YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/GTASeriesVideos ► INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/GTASeriesNews ► FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/GTASeriesNews ► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/GTASeries ► DISCORD: https://discord.gg/GTASeries
#GTA5 #GTAOnline #GTASeriesVideos
ABOUT US
GTA Series Videos is a dedicated fan-channel in no way tied to Rockstar Games or Take-Two Interactive.
Here you can find all the latest news, video walkthroughs and official trailers of the most successful video games published by Rockstar Games, including Grand Theft Auto series, Red Dead Redemption, Max Payne, L.A. Noire, Bully and many others.
ABOUT GRAND THEFT AUTO ONLINE
Grand Theft Auto V for PC also includes Grand Theft Auto Online, with support for 30 players and two spectators. Grand Theft Auto Online for PC will include all existing gameplay upgrades and Rockstar-created content released since the launch of Grand Theft Auto Online, including Heists and Adversary modes.
ABOUT GRAND THEFT AUTO V
When a young street hustler, a retired bank robber and a terrifying psychopath find themselves entangled with some of the most frightening and deranged elements of the criminal underworld, the U.S. government and the entertainment industry, they must pull off a series of dangerous heists to survive in a ruthless city in which they can trust nobody, least of all each other.
Grand Theft Auto V for PC offers players the option to explore the award-winning world of Los Santos and Blaine County in resolutions of up to 4k and beyond, as well as the chance to experience the game running at 60 frames per second.

entry.title: GTA Vice City Collectibles [Rockstar Games Collection]

media:group.media:title: GTA Vice City Collectibles [Rockstar Games Collection]
media:group.media:description:
GTA Vice City Collection - Rare items, video game copies, t-shirts and merchandise collected by GTA Series Videos over the years
If you own something that you would like to sell, contact us at: collection[at]gta-mail.com Or send us a message on Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/gtaseries
Check out the GTA 3 Collection video: https://youtu.be/5bmmectqBJo
► YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/GTASeriesVideos ► INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/GTASeriesNews ► FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/GTASeriesNews ► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/GTASeries ► DISCORD: https://discord.gg/GTASeries
0:00 GTA Vice City Mirror 0:37 GTA Vice City Razor Keychain 0:58 GTA Vice City Beach Towel 1:18 GTA Vice City Pillow 1:44 GTA Vice City Rubik's Cube (Original & 10th Anniversary) 2:19 GTA Vice City Pin Set (Original & 10th Anniversary) 2:52 GTA Vice City Money Clip (Original & 10th Anniversary) 3:10 GTA Vice City Kubrick Box Set (Original & 10th Anniversary) 3:47 GTA Vice City Kubrick Prototypes 4:04 GTA Vice City Kubrick Promo Poster & Postcard 4:16 GTA Vice City Dollar Bills 4:37 GTA Vice City Launch Party Invite & Cocktail Stirrers 5:12 GTA Vice City Postcards 6:13 GTA Vice City License Plate 6:33 GTA Vice City Skin Discs (EB Games & Gamestop) 7:11 GTA Vice City Neon Sign 8:20 GTA Vice City Soundtrack Box Set & Greatest Hits 9:07 GTA Vice City Stickers (Original & 10th Anniversary) 9:40 GTA Vice City 10th Anniversary Swag 10:03 GTA Vice City 10th Anniversary Head Band 10:13 GTA Vice City 10th Anniversary Beach Ball 10:31 GTA Vice City T-Shirts (Original & 10th Anniversary) 11:41 GTA Vice City Hoodies 12:05 GTA Vice City Golf Polo Shirts 12:32 GTA Vice City Baseball Caps 12:52 GTA Vice City Game Copies 13:22 GTA Vice City Press Kit & Promo Copy 14:10 GTA Double Pack Gift Wrap 14:31 GTA Vice City & GTA Double Pack Strategy Guides 14:50 GTA Vice City Press Clippings & Magazines 15:47 GTA Vice City Tommy Painting by Stephen Bliss
#GTAViceCity #Collection #GTATrilogy #GTA #ViceCity #Collectibles #Merchandise #GrandTheftAuto #GTATheTrilogy #GTASeriesVideos
ABOUT US
GTA Series Videos is a dedicated fan-channel in no way tied to Rockstar Games or Take-Two Interactive.
Here you can find all the latest news, video walkthroughs and official trailers of the most successful video games published by Rockstar Games, including Grand Theft Auto series, Red Dead Redemption, Max Payne, L.A. Noire, Bully and many others.
ABOUT GRAND THEFT AUTO VICE CITY
Welcome to Vice City. Welcome to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile. Vice City, a huge urban sprawl ranging from the beach to the swamps and the glitz to the ghetto, was one of the most varied, complete and alive digital cities ever created. Combining open-world gameplay with a character driven narrative, you arrive in a town brimming with delights and degradation and given the opportunity to take it over as you choose.
ABOUT GRAND THEFT AUTO - THE DEFINITIVE EDITION
Three iconic cities, three epic stories. Play the genre-defining classics of the original Grand Theft Auto Trilogy: Grand Theft Auto III, Grand Theft Auto: Vice City and Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas updated for a new generation, now with across-the-board enhancements including brilliant new lighting and environmental upgrades, high-resolution textures, increased draw distances, Grand Theft Auto V-style controls and targeting, and much more, bringing these beloved worlds to life with all new level of detail.

#GTA5 #GTAOnline #shorts #short #GTASeriesVideos
ABOUT US
GTA Series Videos is a dedicated fan-channel in no way tied to Rockstar Games or Take-Two Interactive.
Here you can find all the latest news, video walkthroughs and official trailers of the most successful video games published by Rockstar Games, including Grand Theft Auto series, Red Dead Redemption, Max Payne, L.A. Noire, Bully and many others.
ABOUT GRAND THEFT AUTO ONLINE
Grand Theft Auto V for PC also includes Grand Theft Auto Online, with support for 30 players and two spectators. Grand Theft Auto Online for PC will include all existing gameplay upgrades and Rockstar-created content released since the launch of Grand Theft Auto Online, including Heists and Adversary modes.
ABOUT GRAND THEFT AUTO V
When a young street hustler, a retired bank robber and a terrifying psychopath find themselves entangled with some of the most frightening and deranged elements of the criminal underworld, the U.S. government and the entertainment industry, they must pull off a series of dangerous heists to survive in a ruthless city in which they can trust nobody, least of all each other.
Grand Theft Auto V for PC offers players the option to explore the award-winning world of Los Santos and Blaine County in resolutions of up to 4k and beyond, as well as the chance to experience the game running at 60 frames per second.
